channel.title: My RuneScape memoirs
channel.description:
Edit: changed the title before mods got mad
I have an account and I would like a price check on this. My character is a lovely ebony woman wearing clothes that thief blend nicely with her colour. She also has green hair but that's only because the moss she got from sleeping in the sewers too much.
If you were a buyer looking for an account and this one caught your attention, how much would you pay for it?
Screenshots:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/D5I4j.png[/img]
Me going on a goblin raid with my clan members.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/s13Di.png[/img]
Nice loot from the [s]murder victim[/s]goblin! I buried the bone and wielded the air staff. Here's what I look like with it on:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UKWfs.png[/img]
If you look closely in the chat logs, you'll see another player offering to assist me. I accepted and I, my clan members and him nicely eradicated the goblins.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qJLwi.png[/img]
Me enjoying the loot after we split it up between us.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pVJBX.png[/img]
As I was walking through RuneScape I saw a man being antagonised by a goblin. I decided I was in a good mood and killed the goblin harassing the man. The man was mortally wounded before I had shown up though, so I had to take him to Xenia who is apparently a sorceress that cures afflictions with mysterious combinations of voodoo and gang rape.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bpvEQ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/E7tUm.png[/img]
Xenia decided she would make do with the gang rape this time though, since it didn't look like his wound was that grievous.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/P4zee.png[/img]
That's what she said.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZdOjT.png[/img]
I decided the man was a pussy for not being able to withstand a puny goblin's attacks, so I made up my mind to kill him. I followed the man to his home which was inconveniently located next to the duke's quarters, so I had to wait until the duke went to sleep to assassinate the man.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/01gQD.png[/img]
I also stole his shit then I hightailed it out of there before the police showed up.

item.title: My RuneScape memoirs
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Hes probs just sleep walking.

Read full topic

But it’s true!@!!! D:

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape memoirs
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

LOL…I’ll trade you a white man with black feet?

@pics was a good 30 second read.

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape memoirs
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Now that you made this, everyone will start doing it, and then making price check topics will be against the rules. Exactly like how the “GP Giveaway” thing haven’t.

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape memoirs
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Someone has alot of time on their hands.
This made me laugh though.

I’d say around 1,293Gp or an Adamant Scimitar.

Read full topic

item.title: My RuneScape memoirs
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Edit: changed the title before mods got mad

I have an account and I would like a price check on this. My character is a lovely ebony woman wearing clothes that thief blend nicely with her colour. She also has green hair but that’s only because the moss she got from sleeping in the sewers too much.

If you were a buyer looking for an account and this one caught your attention, how much would you pay for it?

Screenshots:

D5I4j.png801×543

Me going on a goblin raid with my clan members.

s13Di.png799×542

Nice loot from the murder victimgoblin! I buried the bone and wielded the air staff. Here’s what I look like with it on:

UKWfs.png799×539

If you look closely in the chat logs, you’ll see another player offering to assist me. I accepted and I, my clan members and him nicely eradicated the goblins.

qJLwi.png801×542

Me enjoying the loot after we split it up between us.

pVJBX.png799×541

As I was walking through RuneScape I saw a man being antagonised by a goblin. I decided I was in a good mood and killed the goblin harassing the man. The man was mortally wounded before I had shown up though, so I had to take him to Xenia who is apparently a sorceress that cures afflictions with mysterious combinations of voodoo and gang rape.

Xenia decided she would make do with the gang rape this time though, since it didn’t look like his wound was that grievous.

That’s what she said.

ZdOjT.png799×544

I decided the man was a pussy for not being able to withstand a puny goblin’s attacks, so I made up my mind to kill him. I followed the man to his home which was inconveniently located next to the duke’s quarters, so I had to wait until the duke went to sleep to assassinate the man.

01gQD.png801×540

I also stole his shit then I hightailed it out of there before the police showed up.
